item.title: California bans loud commercials on Netflix, Hulu, and other streaming services
item.description: Starting July 1, 2026, streaming services won’t be allowed to “transmit the audio of commercial advertisements louder than the video content the adver...

item.title: Alternative app store AltStore raises $6M, connects with the fediverse
item.description: The alternative app marketplace AltStore has raised $6 million and launches a Mastodon server.

item.title: Security bug in India’s income tax portal exposed taxpayers’ sensitive data
item.description: TechCrunch verified that the security bug in the Indian Income Tax Department's e-Filing portal exposed taxpayers' data to other users. The security r...

item.title: OpenAI and the race for AI-driven commerce
item.description: OpenAI now has all the pieces in place for AI-driven commerce, establishing ChatGPT as a place customers go to buy and retailers go to sell.

item.title: xAI hires former Morgan Stanley banker Anthony Armstrong as CFO
item.description: Armstrong, who advised Musk during his Twitter takeover, will oversee the finances of both xAI and X, which were merged in April, the report said.
